name: FortBoy
description:
FortBoy is a text adventure game written during 7DRL 2022. It features procedurally generated stories, and runs on the original Game Boy. Perfect for the dungeon crawler on-the-go!

Controls

  • D-pad to navigate the fortress in cardinal directions
  • A button to pick up items from the current room
  • B button to use items in your possession

Running this rom on a proper emulator (or flashing it to a physical cartridge) is highly recommended. The preview that's included on this page does not support sound and lacks the atmosphere a real device brings :)

If you are running the demo on this page, the keyboard keys X and Z map to buttons A and B, respectively.

Source on GitHub: tkers/fortboy
